text: Returning keyboard - poor quality construction, seams split after one use. Want exchange for better quality alternative, not same item again.
Poor quality after one use qualifies for return. Instead of exchange, I'll refund $89.99 and recommend upgraded version - higher quality rating. Return label sent.
Ordered wrong size tablet. Need size Large instead of Medium. Can you send replacement before I return wrong size? Don't want to wait.
I can ship size Large monitor now without waiting for Medium return. Prepaid label sent for Medium. If both fit, return whichever doesn't work.
Lost original packaging for laptop. Can I still return in different box? Item unused, tags attached, perfect resellable condition.
Original packaging not required for returns. Use any box to protect item during shipping. As long as item unused with tags, full refund $14.99 approved.
Want to return laptop but it's personalized/customized. Return policy says final sale for customized items. Arrived with printing error though.
Customized items normally final sale, but printing error changes that. This is our mistake. Full refund $139 approved, keep defective item.
Returning keyboard - poor quality construction, seams split after one use. Want exchange for better quality alternative, not same item again.
